text: Margarita Terekhova (; born August 25, 1942) is a Soviet and Russian actress. She was awarded the title People's Artist of Russia (1996). Terekhova's acting debut was in 1965 in the movie Hello, That's Me!. She later starred in The Dog in the Manger and D'Artagnan and Three Musketeers. In 2005, she was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:People with Alzheimer's disease Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian television actors Category:Russian stage actors Category:Soviet movie actors Category:Soviet television actors
title: Margarita Terekhova
